tb = int(input())
for i in range(tb):
    n = int(input())
    ll = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = sum(ll)
    (lsum, rsum) = (0, 0)
    flag = True
    for i in range(len(ll)):
        lsum += ll[i]
        rsum = total - lsum
        if lsum * rsum % 2:
            print('YES')
            flag = False
            break
    if flag:
        print('NO')
